meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Ranunculus with spear-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The spearworts in the garden have long, pointed leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw some beautiful spearworts growing near the pond.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns under the spearworts.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like spearworts, sharp and piercing.
meanings.sent5: The spearworts swayed gracefully in the breeze, resembling tiny green spears.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Ranunculus with spear-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: During our hike, we came across various spearworts along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The field was filled with colorful spearworts, creating a vibrant display.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar thought it was clever to camouflage itself among the spearworts.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like scattered spearworts, each one sharp and distinct.
meanings.sent5: The meadow was a sea of spearworts, their leaves glistening in the sunlight.
